attributes.action: Get more outdoor sports facilities around aycliffe
attributes.additional_details: We want you to sign this petition to get Newton aycliffe town council to invest in some new outdoor sports facilities around the area (basketball courts, Football courts ect.) It would mean alot to us if you could sign this petition in order for this to happen.

rejection.details: This is one for the local council, though you might also want to contact your local MP about this.
